mapper.select: select a.*, (select count(qna_comment_id) from qna_comment where qna_id=a.qna_id) commentcnt from (select q.qna_id, u.user_id, u.id, u.name, q.major_id majorId, m.major_name majorName, q.subject, q.content, q.reg_date, q.hit from qna q, users u, major m where q.user_id = u.user_id and q.major_id = m.major_id and q.qna_id = #{qna_id}) a
select major_id majorId, major_name majorName from major
mapper.update: update qna set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, major_id = #{major_id} where qna_id=#{qna_id}
